doctor.name: Dr. Md. Rezaul Karim
doctor.specialty: Rheumatology (Pain, Arthritis, Joint, Soft Tissue Problems) Specialist
doctor.workplace: Sylhet MAG Osmani Medical College & Hospital
doctor.info: Dr. Md. Rezaul Karim is a Rheumatologist in Sylhet. His qualification is MBBS, BCS (Health), MD (Rheumatology). He is a Consultant, Rheumatology at Sylhet MAG Osmani Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Mount Adora Hospital, Akhalia, Sylhet. Practicing hour of Dr. Md. Rezaul Karim at Mount Adora Hospital, Akhalia, Sylhet is 4pm to 8pm (Closed: Friday).

doctor.info: Dr. Sudeshna Sinha is a Rheumatologist in Sylhet. Her qualification is MBBS, BCS (Health), MD (Rheumatology), Training (UK). She is a Consultant, Rheumatology at Sylhet MAG Osmani Medical College & Hospital. She regularly provides treatment to her patients at Labaid Diagnostic Limited, Sylhet. Practicing hour of Dr. Sudeshna Sinha at Labaid Diagnostic Limited, Sylhet is 5pm to 9pm (Closed: Friday).
